page.title: 17CYCLE TRAINING IN TIBSHELF
page.content: I enjoy cycling in my leisure time. My bike is a Grifter XL and it has got three gears. I have been riding a bike for four years and I have just passed my cycling proficiency test at school. When I went in for it I thought that it was going to be harder than it was. Twelve of us from school took the test. We had about 6 or 8 lessons. Our bikes had to be in good condition and the right size for us. We had to know how to start off properly and how to stop safely. We had to know how to turn right at a stop sign and how to turn left at a halt sign. We had to answer 20 questions on the Highway Code and know the meaning of road signs. All of us passed the test. We each got a badge, a certificate and a sticker for our bike to show that we had passed. by Darryl (11)
